mapper.sql: id, title, peixun_type_id, peixun_type, peixun_time, user_id, user_name, bumen_id, bumen, flag, status, type, chengji, remark, peixun_num, details, create_time
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, peixun_type_id, ( SELECT a.NAME FROM type_info a WHERE a.id = c.peixun_type_id ) peixun_type, peixun_time, DATE_FORMAT( peixun_time, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s" ) startTimeStr, user_id, ( SELECT a.NAME FROM sys_user a WHERE a.user_id = c.user_id ) user_name, bumen_id, bumen, flag, STATUS, type, chengji, remark, peixun_num, details, create_time FROM yuangong_peixun_info c where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into yuangong_peixun_info (id, title, peixun_type_id, peixun_type, peixun_time, user_id, user_name, bumen_id, bumen, flag, status, type, chengji, remark, peixun_num, details, create_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{peixunTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{peixunType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{peixunTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bumenId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bumen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chengji,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{peixunNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{details,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
